sentences: Dani Deahl is a Chicago based EDM, & House music producer, DJ, journalist, and blogger.
She was the producer of a Billboard charted song, ran the music blog DSquared from 2009â€“2015, and is currently DJ Mag's editor at large.
Born and raised in Chicago, Illinois, Deahl became a DJ and got her first few residencies while she was still attending high school.
In 2006, Deahl became producer and co-host of Red Bar Radio, the first internet podcast to be syndicated on terrestrial radio.
In 2014, Deahl did a highly publicized TEDx talk titled "Women, STEM & EDM."
As of 2016, Deahl had taken up a role as an editor for popular music magazine DJ Mag.
